verses.verse: (For the choir director; with stringed instruments. A Psalm. A Song.) God <S%H430><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to us and bless <S%H1288><s%> us, [And] cause His face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon us â€“ Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
That Thy way <S%H1870><s%> may be known <S%H3045><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> Thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>
Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee, O God; <S%H430><s%> Let all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee.

Let the nations <S%H3816><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> and sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy; <S%H7442><s%> For Thou wilt judge <S%H8199><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with uprightness, <S%H4334><s%> And guide <S%H5148><s%> the nations <S%H3816><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee, O God; <S%H430><s%> Let all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee.
The earth <S%H776><s%> has yielded <S%H5414><s%> its produce; <S%H2981><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> blesses <S%H1288><s%> us.
God <S%H430><s%> blesses <S%H1288><s%> us, That all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may fear <S%H3372><s%> Him.
